body:
for the first question,
godoc has no way to know that "func CanonicalHeaderKey(s string) string"
has anything to do with type Header.

2nd question, there is no way to do that. And I think the godoc heuristic
is much better than just grouping by source files.

3rd question, the way godoc organizes functions/methods under a
particular type is based on the following heuristic:
1. the method on that type
2. any func that returns that type
are related to the type, so they should be grouped with the type.

Please see https://golang.org/wiki/Questions how to ask questions.
The issue tracker is intended for bug reports and proposals.
